thread.title: martina dillon
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by martina dillon

author: martina dillon
title: martina dillon
text: Once you order before 7pm you know you will get it the next day, otherwise the day after which I think is still very good. Other online companies take longer and you are never really sure what day they will arrive. Ordering into the store is another fantastic service and so easy to return if your not happy with item/s. Also great choice on their website and you can see exactly what sizes are available before you click into item.
